summary: The customer was having trouble with their Contoso Wireless service and was not receiving any service. The agent asked for the model number of the phone and then suggested restarting the device as a temporary solution. The customer then mentioned that their data speeds were slower than usual and their battery life wasn't as good as it used to be. The agent suggested updating the phone's software and then asked for the customer's email address to send any updates about their service. The agent then said they would look into the issue and contact the customer with an update.
